pr_title: [RW-4159][risk=no] UI environment flags & feature flag cleanup

timeline.bodyText: GitHub is making this diff look more "interesting" than it really is. In this if-else statement here, I kept everything within the "if environment.enableHomepageRestyle" and removed everything in the "else".
timeline.author: gjuggler

timeline.message: Environment cleanup: use backend config for newAccount feature flag & remove old env vars.
Environment cleanup: use backend config for newAccount feature flag & remove old env vars.

timeline.bodyText: While you're touching this, I'd propose turning this off everywhere. We're very far away from flipping this flag on, and certainly the current incarnation is not something we're planning to launch.
timeline.author: calbach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -13,11 +13,9 @@ export const testEnvironmentBase = {
   zendeskHelpCenterUrl: 'http://aousupporthelp.zendesk.com/hc',
   shibbolethUrl: 'http://mock-nih.dev.test.firecloud.org',
   shouldShowDisplayTag: true,
-  enablePublishedWorkspaces: true,
   inactivityTimeoutSeconds: 99999999999,
   inactivityWarningBeforeSeconds: 5 * 60,
-  enableHomepageRestyle: true,
+  enablePublishedWorkspaces: true,

replies.bodyText: We could write a script to look periodically for stale flags that haven't changed in X days and are the same in all environments. You really have to stay on these or they gang up on you.
replies.author: jaycarlton

timeline.message: Turn enablePublishedWorkspaces to false on all envs.
